@graph.rdfs:comment: Geo coordinates in Latitude and Longitude for a given place. The Lat/Long values are in WGS84 notation
@graph.rdfs:label: GeoCoordinates

@graph.rdfs:comment: Longitude of a place. Specified in WGS 84 CRS (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System)
@graph.rdfs:label: longitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: Latitude of a place. Specified in WGS 84 CRS (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System)
@graph.rdfs:label: latitude

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes a generic nested JSON structured value
@graph.rdfs:label: StructuredValue

@graph.rdfs:comment: Describes a generic nested JSON structured value
@graph.rdfs:label: StructuredValue

@graph.rdfs:comment: Value of the quantity being described in the ValueDescriptor object.
@graph.rdfs:label: value

@graph.rdfs:comment: Value of the quantity being described in the ValueDescriptor object.
@graph.rdfs:label: value

@graph.rdfs:comment: Class of all intangible things like Structured valued objects etc.
@graph.rdfs:label: Intangible

@graph.rdfs:comment: Class of all intangible things like Structured valued objects etc.
@graph.rdfs:label: Intangible

@graph.rdfs:comment: Deccribes the current position of the vehicle corresponding to this observation. SameAs:'position' field from GTFS Realtime message-VehiclePosition(https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicleposition)
@graph.rdfs:label: position

@graph.rdfs:comment: Deccribes the current position of the vehicle corresponding to this observation. SameAs:'position' field from GTFS Realtime message-VehiclePosition(https://developers.google.com/transit/gtfs-realtime/reference#message-vehicleposition)
@graph.rdfs:label: position
